title: The Warrior's Bride
description: Desperate to provide for her younger sister and needing money, Lady Ellisia agrees to marry King Odjen, a stranger from the enemy lands of Brumous. A betrothal between the “barbarian” King Odjen of Brumous could bring peace between their warring countries. The problem?King Odjen will have nothing to do with her.Commander Valen, the right-hand man and friend of the king, quickly falls for Ellisia, but with the disapproval of the king overshadowing their betrothal, can they find a way to maintain their love and help end the decades-long the war?Get ready for a warrior who knows what (or rather who) he wants, and a lady who needs some good lovin’ in her life.For readers who want a happily ever after (HEA) and are 18+.
author: Scarlet Duvale
